properties.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 7 at 8:51PM AKST until January 8 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow showers. Additional snowfall of 1 to 2 inches
expected in the next 1 to 2 hours.

* WHERE...Sitka

* WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bands of heavy snow showers expected to
continue for the next one to two hours before tapering off
before midnight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT
